categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Breaker" was the nickname of a clone trooper captain during the Clone Wars. He served under Admiral Wullf Yularen and General Obi-Wan Kenobi during the conquest on Geonosis.

Breaker wore the normal clone Phase I armor with gray stripes down the arms. He also wore a pauldron. His helmet was similar to clone trooper helmets except that its front was foldable and the visor was more closely related to Mandalorian helmets. He was also equipped with a jetpack, and his left gauntlet had an unusually large object that appeared to be a blast shield of some sort.
